Table of contents

Options for multi-temperature simulations

  • --max_temperature or -tmax : Maximum temperature. Examples, --max_temperature 400 Kelvin or -tmax 400 Kelvin.
  • --min_temperature or -tmin : Minimum temperature. Examples, --min_temperature 0.58
  • --num_temperatures or -ntmp : Number of temperatures. Example: -ntmp 16
  • --temperature_file or -tfile : Temperature file. Example: -tfile T.dat . The format for specifying temperatures in the temperature file is explained in the program reference for parallel tempering run (Parallel tempering with PROFASI). The same format works for simulated tempering and simulated annealing.
PROFASI: Protein Folding and Aggregation Simulator, Version 1.5
